= What is new in release v2.4 =

A new functionality added in this release: PLOTS!. There a a couple of standard
plots build in: plot.period, plot.rtr, plot.comfortchart. If you want to use
plots smarthome.py as backend is been required.

Some new widgets inclueded in this shipping:
  * basic.colordisc a new color chooser
  * basic.notify for notifications

Beside that we have made many improvements:
  * New desing: cube v2, best viewed with solar_winds.png background  
  * New language options, located in lang/
  * New icons

== plot.rtr == 

A plot designed for use with a rtr. One serie for set-value, one for actual-value and a pie chart for the time the actor is on.
